ygData.subject: Re: Silence & Wolfblade
ygData.msgSnippet: Wolfblade:: She uncovered her optics to look at him. How can she go on, making him suffer like this, and herself.  She knew she had to make the choice for him.

Wolfblade::

She uncovered her optics to look at him. How can she go on, making him
suffer like this, and herself.  She knew she had to make the choice
for him. But it was breaking her spark more than she could stand. She
tried to speak between the sobs. "I.....*sob*..I wanted to stop things
from going on. *sob* I love you too much. *sob* I coudln't let you
keep going...*sob*...between two bots like this....*sob*...I was going
to make the choice for you."  She covered her face plates again and
wept.  "You told me not to make you make a choice....*sob*.....so I
was going to make it for you so you wouldn't have to.*sob.....I just
wanted to see you happy......and I didn't care if you weren't happy
with me or not....*sob*....I was going to let you go......so you could
be happy....I was going to let you go....and it hurts so
much..*sobs,sobs*...but I am a warrior and warriors have to make hard
choices for the better of the rest......so....I....tried...to
make...a....choice....for the better....of your happiness..*sob*"
She cried with her hands over her face. Between the tears, she
whispered, "I love you too much to see you hurt, so leave me and go to
her. Be happy."  In a an almost inaudiable soft whisper, "I love you." 
*cries*


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice::
>  
> He was shocked when she covered her face and began to cry.  he could
not think for a moment, he did not know what caused her to do this.
>  
> "Wolfblade!  What is wrong?!  What happened?  Have... have I hurt
you? Wolfblade, are you okay?"
> 
>
